item.title: 🧠 Kubernetes 101: Book Recommendations, K8s Basics, and Getting Started! 🐾🐳
item.description:
INSERT PIC HERE

📚 Let’s Start With a Book!

Before diving into YAML and containers, I highly recommend The Kubernetes Book by Nigel Poulton. It’s beginner-friendly, concise, and full of real-world insights! A great read while sipping ☕ or cuddling your pup 🐕

🌍 Where Did the Word “Kubernetes” Come From? The word Kubernetes (pronounced koo-ber-net-ees) comes from the Greek, meaning helmsman or pilot of a ship ⛵. Fitting, since it’s all about steering your containers through cloud seas!
